definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pass on, away (Targum (oft. for Heb. [[עָבַר]], Syr.; v. BH I. [[עָדָה]] (rare, late));—
pass on, over, c. [[ב]] pers. Da 3:27.
pass way, of kingdom Da 4:28 ([[מִן]] pers.), Da 7:14; of law Da 6:9.

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: take away (so Eg. Aram. S-C:G 35): Pf. 3 mpl. [[הֶעְדִּיו]], acc. rei, Da 5:20 ([[מִן]] pers.), Da 7:12; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְהַעְדּוּן]] v:Da 7:26; Pt. [[מְהַעְדֵּה]] Da 2:21 remove, depose kings, of God.
